title: Machine Learning
description: Experienced in building machine learning and deep learning models, with particular expertise in Python and frameworks such as PyTorch and TensorFlow.

title: Web Development
description: Skilled in modern frontend technologies including React, Next.js, and Tailwind CSS, capable of creating responsive and interactive web applications.

title: Software Development
description: Strong programming foundation in Java, Python, and C++ with experience developing software and solving algorithmic problems.

title: Database Management
description: Experienced in database design, management, and SQL queries, particularly in relational databases like MySQL.

title: Version Control & Collaboration
description: Proficient in Git and GitHub, actively collaborating on team projects and managing codebases effectively.

title: UI/UX Design
description: Knowledgeable in UI/UX design principles, using tools like Figma to create user-centered, intuitive interfaces.
